1: -module(stop_SUITE).
    2: -include("public_transport.hrl").
    3: -include("logger.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl"). %% For assertion macros
    6: 
    7: -export([ passenger_check_in_case/1
    8:         , passenger_check_out_case/1
    9:         , vehicle_check_in_case/1
   10:         , vehicle_check_out_case/1
   11:         , invalid_vehicle_check_out_case/1]).
   12: 
   13: -export([ all/0
   14:         , init_per_testcase/2
   15:         , end_per_testcase/2]).
   16: 
   17: 
   18: all() ->
   19:   [ passenger_check_in_case
   20:   , passenger_check_out_case
   21:   , vehicle_check_in_case
   22:   , vehicle_check_out_case
   23:   , invalid_vehicle_check_out_case
   24:   ].
   25: 
   26: 
   27: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   28:   put(id, ?MODULE),
   29:   put(module, ?MODULE_STRING),
   30:   LogName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ [$_|atom_to_list(TestCase)] ++ "_log",
   31:   ct:comment("<a href=\"../../logs/" ++ LogName ++ "/index.html\">" ++ LogName ++ "</a>"),
   32:   logger:start_link(?MODULE_STRING ++ [$_|atom_to_list(TestCase)] ++ "_log"),
   33:   stop_supervisor:start_link(),
   34:   P1 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p1, strict),
   35:   P2 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p2, strict),
   36:   P3 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p3, strict),
   37:   P4 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p4, strict),
   38:   V1 = gen_server_mock:start(vehicle, v1, strict),
   39:   V2 = gen_server_mock:start(vehicle, v2, strict),
   40:   Stop = stop_supervisor:start_stop(stop1),
   41:   Config ++ [ {p1, P1}
   42:             , {p2, P2}
   43:             , {p3, P3}
   44:             , {p4, P4}
   45:             , {v1, V1}
   46:             , {v2, V2}
   47:             , {stop, Stop}
   48:             ].
   49: 
   50: 
   51: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   52:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
   53:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
   54:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
   55:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
   56:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
   57:   V2 = ?config(v2, Config),
   58:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
   59:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P1)),
   60:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P2)),
   61:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P3)),
   62:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P4)),
   63:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(V1)),
   64:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(V2)),
   65:   gen_server_mock:stop(P1),
   66:   gen_server_mock:stop(P2),
   67:   gen_server_mock:stop(P3),
   68:   gen_server_mock:stop(P4),
   69:   gen_server_mock:stop(V1),
   70:   gen_server_mock:stop(V2),
   71:   logger:stop(),
   72:   stop_supervisor:stop_stop(Stop),
   73:   Config.
   74: 
   75: 
   76: passenger_check_in_case(Config) ->
   77:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
   78:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
   79:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
   80:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
   81:   
   82:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
   83:   ?assertMatch({nok, _}, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
   84:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
   85:   ?assertMatch(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)).
   86: 
   87: passenger_check_out_case(Config) ->
   88:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
   89:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
   90:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
   91:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
   92:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
   93:   
   94:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
   95:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
   96:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)),
   97: 
   98:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 3, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
   99:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  100:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  101:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  102: 
  103:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
  104: 
  105:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P1, false),
  106:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P2, false),
  107:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P3, true).
  108: 
  109: vehicle_check_in_case(Config) ->
  110:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  111:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  112:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  113:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  114:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
  115:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
  116:   
  117:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
  118:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
  119: 
  120:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 1, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  121:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  122:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, false),
  123: 
  124:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
  125: 
  126:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  127:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P4, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, false),
  128:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?INCREMENT_BOARDING_PASSENGER, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  129:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)),
  130:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P4)).
  131: 
  132: vehicle_check_out_case(Config) ->
  133:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  134:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  135:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  136:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
  137:   V2 = ?config(v2, Config),
  138:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
  139:   
  140:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
  141:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P1, false),
  142: 
  143:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
  144:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
  145:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)),
  146: 
  147:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 3, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  148:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  149:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  150:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  151: 
  152:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
  153:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V2, true),
  154: 
  155:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P1, false),
  156:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P2, false),
  157: 
  158:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(V2)), %% Validate that the checkin_ok has not been sent prematurely
  159:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V2, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 0, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  160: 
  161:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P3, true),
  162:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT(Stop, V1, true),
  163:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT(Stop, V2, true). %% Exercise check out when no vehicles queued
  164: 
  165: invalid_vehicle_check_out_case(Config) ->
  166:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
  167:   V2 = ?config(v2, Config),
  168:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
  169: 
  170:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 0, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  171: 
  172:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
  173:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT(Stop, V2, true).
